_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc60:1.5^speaker: monks from the group of seventeen
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc60:1.9^speaker: monks from the group of seventeen
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc60:1.13^speaker: monks from the group of six
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc60:1.17^where_before_or_a: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc60^where: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
